description:
Can you say tough and soft at the same time? Because that's what you get with the outdoor-ready Mojave Short. Take them climbing or wear them on the trail, just don't be surprised if people stop you to ask where they can get their 90s fix too.

In celebration of 30 years, the gender neutral prAna Originals collection is a remix of our greatest 90s hits. It's inspired by the iconic vibes outdoor enthusiasts loved back in the day, but upgraded with modern-day fits and even more Earth-conscious craftsmanship.
name: Prana Mojave Shorts - Mens
